heading: 1.2.2 Captioned figures and tables
text:
Figures tables captions can also cross-referenced elsewhere book using \@ref(fig:chunk-label) \@ref(tab:chunk-label), respectively.See Figure 1.1.
Figure 1.1: nice figure!
Don’t miss Table 1.1.Table 1.1: nice table!
code:
par(mar = c(4, 4, .1, .1))
plot(pressure, type = 'b', pch = 19)
knitr::kable(
  head(pressure, 10), caption = 'Here is a nice table!',
  booktabs = TRUE
